text: James Cameron Davidson (born 13 December 1953) is an English stand-up comedian. He hosted both Big Break and The Generation Game television shows. He also developed adult pantomime shows: Boobs in the Wood, Chalkie Does Dallas, and Sinderella. Davidson known for black comedy, he was criticized for the content of his act. In 2007, he was voted the 73rd-greatest stand-up comic on Channel 4's 100 Greatest Stand-Ups. Davidson won the 13th series of British reality television show Celebrity Big Brother.http://www.digitalspy.co.uk/tv/s150/celebrity-big- brother/news/a547600/celebrity-big-brother-final-jim-davidson-named-winner- dappy-is-runner-up.html == References == == Bibliography == * Jim Davidson: Close to the Edge. 2001. Ebury Press.
